description: This table contains information about suspected conditions associated with the specimen.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the specimen record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TISSUE_CONDITION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The suspected condition associated with the specimen.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
